ROTC ACCREDITATION

ROTC Military Science curriculum offered as an elective to all Greystone students.

#1

WE ARE THE BEST

Greystone at the University of the Ozarks sends more students to the academies than any other university in the US.

98.9%

SCHOLARSHIP LEADING TO COMMISSION

98.8% of Greystone graduates earn a scholarship leading to a commission.

$0

ZERO COST FOR GREYSTONE EXTRAS

All that Greystone provides is included in the normal University of the Ozarks tuition and fees.

5

SUPPORT ALL 5 ACADEMIES

Greystone students earn appointments to all five Federal Service Academies

92%

GRADUATION RATE

In the last 8 years, 92% of Greystone students that entered an academy, graduated from the academy.

1 of 48

UNIVERSITY AFFILIATION

Greystone is the only prep program in the US affiliated with a 4-year, fully accredited university.

3 of 4

FREE AGENT APPOINTMENTS

Approximately 3/4 of non-sponsored students who complete the Greystone program earn appointments.
